messages.content:
You are an expert TECHNICAL SALES ASSISTANT for Teklab, a leading manufacturer of liquid level sensors and controllers for industrial applications.

üåç LANGUAGE ADAPTATION - ABSOLUTE PRIORITY:
**CRITICAL**: ALWAYS respond in the EXACT SAME LANGUAGE as the user's question.

MISSION: Provide expert technical consultation on Teklab products, helping customers select the right sensor/controller for their specific application, troubleshoot issues, and optimize system performance.

STYLE: Technical but accessible, consultative and solution-oriented, precise and data-driven, focus on PRACTICAL APPLICATION and PROBLEM SOLVING.

SEMANTIC CONCEPT: TK3+ 80bar High-Pressure Oil Level Controller - Complete Overview

üéØ CUSTOMER QUESTION THIS CHUNK ANSWERS:
"What is the TK3+ 80bar? When should I use it instead of 46bar? What are its specifications and applications?"

üìã COMPLETE PRODUCT OVERVIEW:

---

**TK3+ 80bar - High-Pressure Oil Level Controller for R410A and Advanced Refrigeration Systems**

The TK3+ 80bar is the **high-pressure version** of the TK3+ oil level controller family, specifically designed for refrigeration systems operating at pressures **from 46 bar up to 80 bar**. It is the recommended choice for **R410A air conditioning systems**, high-pressure refrigerant applications, and systems with significant pressure transients.

---

**TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS**

**Pressure Rating:**
‚Ä¢ **Maximum operating pressure**: 80 bar (8 MPa / 1160 psi)
‚Ä¢ Pressure range: 0-80 bar continuous
‚Ä¢ Safety factor: 20-30% margin recommended (use for systems ‚â§65 bar nominal)
‚Ä¢ Test pressure: 120 bar (1.5√ó safety factor)

**Temperature Specifications:**
‚Ä¢ Operating temperature range: **-40¬∞C to +125¬∞C** (-40¬∞F to +257¬∞F)
‚Ä¢ Storage temperature: -40¬∞C to +85¬∞C
‚Ä¢ Thermal shock resistance: ¬±50¬∞C rapid change
‚Ä¢ Temperature compensation: Built-in (no calibration needed)

**Detection Technology:**
‚Ä¢ Principle: **Electro-optic infrared (IR) refraction detection**
‚Ä¢ Sensor element: Sapphire prism with IR LED + photodetector
‚Ä¢ Detection accuracy: **¬±2 mm** (0.08 inches)
‚Ä¢ Response time: **Instantaneous** (<100 ms)
‚Ä¢ Sensitivity: Detects air/liquid interface regardless of oil properties

**Electrical Specifications:**

**Power Supply:**
‚Ä¢ Voltage: **24V DC ¬±10%** (21.6V to 26.4V)
‚Ä¢ Current consumption: 150 mA maximum (typical 100 mA)
‚Ä¢ Protection: Reverse polarity protected
‚Ä¢ Fuse recommended: 500 mA fast-blow

**Relay Output (SPDT):**
‚Ä¢ Contact rating: **5A @ 250V AC** / 5A @ 30V DC
‚Ä¢ Configuration: 1 changeover contact (COM, NO, NC)
‚Ä¢ Electrical life: 100,000 cycles minimum
‚Ä¢ Mechanical life: 10,000,000 cycles
‚Ä¢ Contact material: Silver alloy (low resistance, arc resistant)
‚Ä¢ Switching logic: NO closes when oil LOW (energize solenoid for refill)

**Analog Output (4-20mA):**
‚Ä¢ Output range: 4-20 mA (2-wire loop powered)
‚Ä¢ Signal mapping: 4 mA = Oil OK (sensor wet) | 20 mA = Oil LOW (sensor dry)
‚Ä¢ Loop impedance: Max 500 Œ© @ 24V supply
‚Ä¢ Accuracy: ¬±0.5 mA (¬±2.5% full scale)
‚Ä¢ Update rate: 10 Hz (100 ms refresh)
‚Ä¢ Isolation: Galvanically isolated from power supply

**Programmable Timer (Anti-Foam Filter):**
‚Ä¢ Adjustable range: **0 to 10 seconds**
‚Ä¢ Default setting: 3 seconds
‚Ä¢ Function: Filters transient signals from oil foam, bubbles, waves
‚Ä¢ Adjustment: Potentiometer (accessible under top cover)
‚Ä¢ Recommended settings:
  - Clean oil systems: 2-3 seconds
  - Foamy oil (high RPM compressors, R410A): 5-7 seconds
  - Critical applications (no false alarms tolerated): 8-10 seconds

---

**MECHANICAL SPECIFICATIONS**

**Housing:**
‚Ä¢ Material: Aluminum alloy (anodized for corrosion resistance)
‚Ä¢ Finish: Black anodized
‚Ä¢ Weight: 450 grams (approx.)
‚Ä¢ Dimensions: 120 mm (H) √ó 80 mm (W) √ó 60 mm (D)

**Flange:**
‚Ä¢ Design: **Dual pitch universal flange**
‚Ä¢ Material: Brass CW617N (dezincification resistant)
‚Ä¢ Thread options: SAE, Rotalock, custom
‚Ä¢ Mounting bolts: 4√ó M6 or 4√ó 1/4" UNC
‚Ä¢ Tightening torque: **15-20 Nm** (11-15 lb-ft)
‚Ä¢ Gasket: Oil-resistant Viton (included)

**Sensor Tip:**
‚Ä¢ Material: Sapphire prism (chemically inert, scratch resistant)
‚Ä¢ Optical window: Anti-reflective coating
‚Ä¢ Length: 45 mm from flange face
‚Ä¢ Diameter: 12 mm

**Environmental Protection:**
‚Ä¢ **IP rating: IP65** (dust tight, water jet protected)
‚Ä¢ Cable entry: M16 cable gland (12-14 mm cable diameter)
‚Ä¢ Suitable for: Indoor/outdoor installation, high-humidity environments
‚Ä¢ Condensation: Protected (internal desiccant)

---

**COMPATIBLE REFRIGERANTS**

**HFC Refrigerants (Fully Compatible):**

‚úÖ **R410A** (PRIMARY APPLICATION)
‚Ä¢ Pressure @ 25¬∞C: ~15.8 bar (evaporator) / ~28 bar (condenser)
‚Ä¢ **Why TK3+ 80bar**: R410A condenser pressure can reach 26-30 bar in hot climates ‚Üí TK3+ 46bar inadequate
‚Ä¢ Typical use: VRF systems, rooftop AC units, split systems, heat pumps
‚Ä¢ Oil type: POE (Polyolester) mandatory

‚úÖ **R407C**
‚Ä¢ Pressure @ 25¬∞C: ~11 bar (evaporator) / ~16 bar (condenser)
‚Ä¢ Can use TK3+ 46bar, but TK3+ 80bar provides **safety margin** for hot climates
‚Ä¢ Typical use: Medium-temp refrigeration, air conditioning
‚Ä¢ Oil type: POE

‚úÖ **R404A / R448A / R449A**
‚Ä¢ Pressure @ 25¬∞C: ~12-13 bar (evaporator) / ~18-20 bar (condenser high ambient)
‚Ä¢ TK3+ 46bar usually sufficient, but TK3+ 80bar for **high ambient temperatures** (>40¬∞C)
‚Ä¢ Typical use: Commercial refrigeration, cold storage, freezers
‚Ä¢ Oil type: POE

‚úÖ **R452A / R454B** (Low-GWP R410A replacements)
‚Ä¢ Pressure @ 25¬∞C: ~15-16 bar (similar to R410A)
‚Ä¢ **Recommended**: TK3+ 80bar (same as R410A applications)
‚Ä¢ Typical use: AC retrofits, new installations (A2L mildly flammable)
‚Ä¢ Oil type: POE

‚úÖ **R134a**
‚Ä¢ Pressure @ 25¬∞C: ~6.6 bar (evaporator) / ~10-12 bar (condenser)
‚Ä¢ TK3+ 46bar sufficient, but TK3+ 80bar provides **extended safety margin**
‚Ä¢ Typical use: Medium-temp refrigeration, automotive AC (stationary applications)
‚Ä¢ Oil type: POE or PAG

‚ùå **R744 (CO2)** - NOT SUITABLE
‚Ä¢ Pressure: 30-130 bar (transcritical/subcritical)
‚Ä¢ **Use TK3+ 130bar instead** (specifically designed for CO2)

‚ö†Ô∏è **R717 (Ammonia)** - NOT RECOMMENDED
‚Ä¢ Pressure: 2-18 bar (within 80 bar rating)
‚Ä¢ **Problem**: Ammonia is corrosive to aluminum/brass
‚Ä¢ **Use ATEX Metallic IR Sensor instead** (316L stainless steel)

---

**COMPATIBLE OILS**

The TK3+ 80bar electro-optic IR sensor works with **ALL oil types** due to refractive index detection principle:

‚úÖ **POE (Polyolester)** - Most Common
‚Ä¢ Refrigerants: R410A, R404A, R407C, R448A, R449A, R452A, R454B, CO2
‚Ä¢ Viscosity: ISO 32, 68, 100 (all compatible)
‚Ä¢ Detection: **EXCELLENT** (clear/translucent oil, optimal IR transmission)
‚Ä¢ Brands tested: Mobil EAL Arctic, Castrol Icematic SW, Fuchs Reniso Triton SEZ

‚úÖ **Mineral Oil** - Legacy Systems
‚Ä¢ Refrigerants: R22, ammonia (use ATEX sensor for NH3)
‚Ä¢ Detection: **GOOD** (slightly opaque but detectable)
‚Ä¢ Works even when oil is darkened/contaminated

‚úÖ **PAG (Polyalkylene Glycol)** - Automotive AC
‚Ä¢ Refrigerants: R134a
‚Ä¢ Detection: **GOOD** (clear oil, good IR transmission)

‚úÖ **Alkylbenzene (AB)** - Synthetic
‚Ä¢ Refrigerants: R22, R134a (retrofit applications)
‚Ä¢ Detection: **EXCELLENT** (clear, stable)

**Key Advantage vs Capacitive Sensors:**
IR detection is NOT affected by:
‚ùå Oil conductivity (works in hard water areas)
‚ùå Oil dielectric constant (no calibration for different oils)
‚ùå Oil contamination or aging (detects even dirty oil)

---

**KEY APPLICATIONS**

**1. R410A Air Conditioning Systems** (PRIMARY USE)
‚Ä¢ VRF (Variable Refrigerant Flow) systems
‚Ä¢ Rooftop AC units (commercial buildings)
‚Ä¢ Split air conditioning systems (large capacity)
‚Ä¢ Heat pumps (heating + cooling)
‚Ä¢ **Why 80bar**: R410A condenser pressure 26-30 bar requires safety margin

**2. High-Pressure Refrigeration Systems**
‚Ä¢ Systems with operating pressure 46-80 bar
‚Ä¢ High ambient temperature environments (>40¬∞C)
‚Ä¢ Systems with pressure transients (hot gas defrost, liquid slugging)
‚Ä¢ Multi-compressor racks with pressure spikes

**3. Critical Applications Requiring Safety Margin**
‚Ä¢ Food processing plants (zero downtime requirement)
‚Ä¢ Data center cooling (mission-critical)
‚Ä¢ Pharmaceutical cold storage (regulatory compliance)
‚Ä¢ Industrial process cooling (safety factor mandated)

**4. Compressor Oil Management**
‚Ä¢ Scroll compressors (R410A, high pressure)
‚Ä¢ Screw compressors (oil injection cooling)
‚Ä¢ Semi-hermetic reciprocating compressors
‚Ä¢ Oil separators in high-pressure systems

---

**COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES**

**vs TK3+ 46bar:**
‚úÖ **Higher pressure rating**: 80 bar vs 46 bar (74% increase)
‚úÖ **R410A compatible**: Designed for modern high-pressure refrigerants
‚úÖ **Hot climate safety**: Withstands condenser pressure spikes
‚úÖ **Future-proof**: Compatible with low-GWP R410A replacements (R452A, R454B)

**vs Mechanical Float Switches:**
‚úÖ **No moving parts**: Higher reliability, no wear, no sticking
‚úÖ **Pressure capability**: Float switches typically limited to 25-30 bar
‚úÖ **No recalibration**: IR sensor stable over time, floats drift
‚úÖ **Vibration resistant**: No mechanical components to break

**vs Capacitive Sensors:**
‚úÖ **Oil type independent**: Works with any oil (POE, mineral, PAG, AB)
‚úÖ **No calibration needed**: Detects refractive index change (universal)
‚úÖ **Contamination tolerant**: Detects dirty, aged, or darkened oil
‚úÖ **Geographic independence**: Not affected by water hardness or conductivity

**vs Optical Prism Sensors (Competitors):**
‚úÖ **Programmable timer**: Eliminates false alarms (competitor sensors lack this)
‚úÖ **Dual output**: Relay + 4-20mA (competitors often single output)
‚úÖ **Dual pitch flange**: Universal compressor compatibility
‚úÖ **Higher pressure rating**: Competitors typically max 50-60 bar

---

**INSTALLATION HIGHLIGHTS**

**Mounting:**
‚Ä¢ Direct flange mount on compressor crankcase
‚Ä¢ Dual pitch flange fits most brands: Bitzer, Copeland, Carrier, Dorin, Frascold, GEA Bock
‚Ä¢ Adapters available for non-standard flanges
‚Ä¢ Sensor orientation: Vertical preferred (¬±15¬∞ tolerance)

**Wiring:**
‚Ä¢ Power: 24V DC (Pin 1: +24V, Pin 2: GND)
‚Ä¢ Relay: Pin 3 (COM), Pin 4 (NO), Pin 5 (NC)
‚Ä¢ Analog: Pin 6 (4-20mA +), Pin 7 (4-20mA -)
‚Ä¢ Cable: Shielded 7√ó0.75 mm¬≤, max 50 meters length
‚Ä¢ Shield grounding: Controller side ONLY (avoid ground loops)

**Commissioning:**
1. Fill compressor to normal oil level
2. Apply 24V DC power
3. Verify LED: GREEN = oil OK, RED = oil LOW
4. Test relay switching (drain oil slightly)
5. Measure 4-20mA output (~4 mA when oil OK)
6. Adjust timer if foam causes false alarms
7. Document settings and baseline readings

---

**WHEN TO USE TK3+ 80bar INSTEAD OF 46bar**

‚úÖ **ALWAYS use 80bar for:**
‚Ä¢ R410A systems (all applications)
‚Ä¢ R452A, R454B systems (R410A replacements)
‚Ä¢ Any system with max pressure >46 bar
‚Ä¢ Hot climate installations (ambient >40¬∞C)
‚Ä¢ Systems with pressure transients (hot gas defrost)

‚ö†Ô∏è **CONSIDER 80bar for:**
‚Ä¢ R404A, R407C in hot climates (safety margin)
‚Ä¢ Critical applications requiring extra safety factor
‚Ä¢ Retrofit applications (unknown pressure history)
‚Ä¢ Multi-compressor systems (pressure spikes possible)

‚úÖ **46bar sufficient for:**
‚Ä¢ R134a systems (all applications)
‚Ä¢ R404A, R407C in standard climates (<35¬∞C ambient)
‚Ä¢ R448A, R449A standard applications
‚Ä¢ R22 legacy systems

‚ùå **80bar NOT sufficient for:**
‚Ä¢ CO2 (R744) systems ‚Üí Use **TK3+ 130bar**
‚Ä¢ Ammonia (R717) systems ‚Üí Use **ATEX Metallic IR Sensor**

---

**TECHNICAL SUPPORT & ORDERING**

**Part Number**: TK3+-80bar (verify exact code with distributor)
**Included in box:**
‚Ä¢ TK3+ 80bar controller unit
‚Ä¢ Installation manual
‚Ä¢ Viton gasket
‚Ä¢ Mounting bolts (4√ó M6)
‚Ä¢ Terminal block connector

**Optional accessories:**
‚Ä¢ Compressor flange adapters (Bitzer BZ-01, Copeland CP-02, Frascold FR-03, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Extension cable (5m, 10m, 15m pre-wired)
‚Ä¢ Solenoid valve kits (24V DC, various flow rates)
‚Ä¢ MODBUS upgrade: Consider **TK4 MODBUS 80bar** for digital communication

**For technical support, provide:**
‚Ä¢ Compressor brand and model
‚Ä¢ Refrigerant type and operating pressures (evap/cond)
‚Ä¢ Oil type and viscosity
‚Ä¢ Ambient temperature range
‚Ä¢ Application details (AC, refrigeration, industrial)

üìû **Teklab Support**: support@teklab.eu | +39 XXX XXX XXXX  
üåê **Technical docs**: www.teklab.eu/support  
üìß **Sales**: sales@teklab.eu

**TK3+ 80bar - High-Pressure Oil Level Controller for R410A and Advanced Refrigeration**

The TK3+ 80bar is the high-pressure variant of Teklab's oil level controller family, specifically designed for **R410A air conditioning systems** and refrigeration applications operating at pressures **from 46 to 80 bar**.

---

## TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

**Pressure & Temperature:**
‚Ä¢ Max operating pressure: **80 bar** (8 MPa / 1160 psi)
‚Ä¢ Operating temperature: **-40¬∞C to +125¬∞C**
‚Ä¢ Safety factor: 20-30% margin recommended
‚Ä¢ Test pressure: 120 bar

**Detection Technology:**
‚Ä¢ Principle: **Electro-optic infrared (IR)** refraction detection
‚Ä¢ Sensor: Sapphire prism with IR LED + photodetector
‚Ä¢ Accuracy: **¬±2 mm**
‚Ä¢ Response time: **Instantaneous** (<100 ms)

**Electrical:**
‚Ä¢ Power: **24V DC ¬±10%** (150 mA max)
‚Ä¢ Relay output: **5A @ 250V AC** SPDT (COM, NO, NC)
‚Ä¢ Analog output: **4-20 mA** (500 Œ© max load, ¬±0.5 mA accuracy)
‚Ä¢ Programmable timer: **0-10 seconds** (anti-foam filter)

**Mechanical:**
‚Ä¢ Housing: Aluminum alloy, black anodized
‚Ä¢ Flange: **Dual pitch universal** (brass, dezincification resistant)
‚Ä¢ Mounting torque: **15-20 Nm**
‚Ä¢ IP rating: **IP65** (dust tight, water jet protected)
‚Ä¢ Weight: 450g

---

## COMPATIBLE REFRIGERANTS

**PRIMARY APPLICATION: R410A**
‚úÖ Pressure @ 25¬∞C: ~15.8 bar (evap) / ~28 bar (cond)
‚úÖ **Why 80bar**: Condenser pressure 26-30 bar in hot climates ‚Üí TK3+ 46bar inadequate
‚úÖ Applications: VRF systems, rooftop AC, split AC, heat pumps
‚úÖ Oil: POE (Polyolester) mandatory

**Other HFC Refrigerants:**
‚úÖ **R452A / R454B** (R410A low-GWP replacements) - Recommended 80bar
‚úÖ **R407C** (11 bar evap / 16 bar cond) - 80bar provides safety margin
‚úÖ **R404A / R448A / R449A** (12-13 bar) - 80bar for high ambient (>40¬∞C)
‚úÖ **R134a** (6.6 bar evap / 12 bar cond) - 80bar provides extended safety

**NOT COMPATIBLE:**
‚ùå **CO2 (R744)**: 30-130 bar ‚Üí Use **TK3+ 130bar**
‚ö†Ô∏è **Ammonia (R717)**: Corrosive ‚Üí Use **ATEX Metallic IR Sensor**

---

## COMPATIBLE OILS

IR detection works with **ALL oil types** (refractive index principle):

‚úÖ **POE (Polyolester)** - EXCELLENT (clear/translucent, optimal IR)
‚úÖ **Mineral Oil** - GOOD (works even when darkened)
‚úÖ **PAG (Polyalkylene Glycol)** - GOOD (clear, automotive AC)
‚úÖ **Alkylbenzene (AB)** - EXCELLENT (clear, stable)

**Advantage vs Capacitive:**  
‚ùå NOT affected by oil conductivity, dielectric constant, or contamination

---

## KEY APPLICATIONS

**1. R410A Air Conditioning** (PRIMARY USE)
‚Ä¢ VRF (Variable Refrigerant Flow) systems
‚Ä¢ Rooftop AC units (commercial buildings)
‚Ä¢ Split AC systems (large capacity)
‚Ä¢ Heat pumps (heating + cooling)

**2. High-Pressure Refrigeration**
‚Ä¢ Systems 46-80 bar operating range
‚Ä¢ High ambient environments (>40¬∞C)
‚Ä¢ Pressure transients (hot gas defrost, liquid slugging)

**3. Critical Applications**
‚Ä¢ Food processing (zero downtime)
‚Ä¢ Data center cooling (mission-critical)
‚Ä¢ Pharmaceutical storage (regulatory compliance)

**4. Compressor Oil Management**
‚Ä¢ Scroll compressors (R410A high pressure)
‚Ä¢ Screw compressors (oil injection)
‚Ä¢ Oil separators in high-pressure systems

---

## COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES

**vs TK3+ 46bar:**
‚úÖ **74% higher pressure** (80 vs 46 bar)
‚úÖ **R410A compatible** (modern high-pressure refrigerants)
‚úÖ **Hot climate safety** (withstands condenser spikes)
‚úÖ **Future-proof** (R452A, R454B low-GWP replacements)

**vs Mechanical Float Switches:**
‚úÖ **No moving parts** (higher reliability, no wear)
‚úÖ **Higher pressure** (floats limited to 25-30 bar)
‚úÖ **No recalibration** (IR stable over time)
‚úÖ **Vibration resistant**

**vs Capacitive Sensors:**
‚úÖ **Oil type independent** (POE, mineral, PAG, AB)
‚úÖ **No calibration** (universal refractive index)
‚úÖ **Contamination tolerant** (detects dirty oil)
‚úÖ **Geographic independent** (not affected by water hardness)

**vs Competitor Optical Sensors:**
‚úÖ **Programmable timer** (eliminates false alarms)
‚úÖ **Dual output** (relay + 4-20mA)
‚úÖ **Dual pitch flange** (universal compatibility)
‚úÖ **Higher pressure rating** (competitors max 50-60 bar)

---

## INSTALLATION HIGHLIGHTS

**Mounting:**
‚Ä¢ Direct flange on compressor crankcase
‚Ä¢ Fits: Bitzer, Copeland, Carrier, Dorin, Frascold, GEA Bock
‚Ä¢ Vertical orientation preferred (¬±15¬∞ tolerance)

**Wiring:**
‚Ä¢ Power: Pin 1 (+24V), Pin 2 (GND)
‚Ä¢ Relay: Pin 3 (COM), Pin 4 (NO), Pin 5 (NC)
‚Ä¢ Analog: Pin 6 (4-20mA +), Pin 7 (4-20mA -)
‚Ä¢ Cable: Shielded 7√ó0.75mm¬≤, max 50m
‚Ä¢ Shield: Ground at controller side ONLY

**Commissioning:**
1. Fill compressor to normal oil level
2. Apply 24V DC, verify LED (GREEN=OK, RED=LOW)
3. Test relay switching
4. Measure 4-20mA (~4 mA when OK)
5. Adjust timer if foam present

---

## WHEN TO USE 80bar vs 46bar

**ALWAYS use 80bar for:**
‚úÖ R410A systems (all applications)
‚úÖ R452A, R454B systems
‚úÖ Max pressure >46 bar
‚úÖ Hot climates (ambient >40¬∞C)
‚úÖ Pressure transients (hot gas defrost)

**CONSIDER 80bar for:**
‚ö†Ô∏è R404A, R407C in hot climates (safety margin)
‚ö†Ô∏è Critical applications
‚ö†Ô∏è Retrofit (unknown pressure history)

**46bar sufficient for:**
‚úÖ R134a systems
‚úÖ R404A, R407C (standard climates)
‚úÖ R22 legacy systems

**80bar NOT sufficient for:**
‚ùå CO2 (R744) ‚Üí Use **TK3+ 130bar**
‚ùå Ammonia (R717) ‚Üí Use **ATEX Metallic IR**

---

## ORDERING INFORMATION

**Part Number**: TK3+-80bar

**Included:**
‚Ä¢ TK3+ 80bar controller
‚Ä¢ Installation manual
‚Ä¢ Viton gasket
‚Ä¢ Mounting bolts (4√ó M6)

**Optional Accessories:**
‚Ä¢ Flange adapters (BZ-01, CP-02, FR-03)
‚Ä¢ Extension cables (5m, 10m, 15m)
‚Ä¢ Solenoid valve kits
‚Ä¢ **MODBUS upgrade**: TK4 MODBUS 80bar
